019package org.jgrapes.core.internal;
020
021import java.util.IdentityHashMap;
022import java.util.Map;
023import java.util.logging.Level;
024import java.util.logging.Logger;
025import org.jgrapes.core.ComponentType;
026
027/**
028 * A registry for generators. Used to track generators and determine
029 * whether the application has stopped.
030 */
031@SuppressWarnings("PMD.ClassWithOnlyPrivateConstructorsShouldBeFinal")
032public class GeneratorRegistry {
033
034    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.FieldNamingConventions")
035    private static final Logger generatorTracking
036        = Logger.getLogger(ComponentType.class.getPackage().getName()
037            + ".generatorTracking");
038
039    private long running;
040    private Thread keepAlive;
041    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ImmutableField")
042    private Map<Object, Object> generators;
043
044    /**
045     * Holds a generator instance.
046     */
047    private static final class InstanceHolder {
048        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AccessorClassGeneration")
049        private static final GeneratorRegistry INSTANCE
050            = new GeneratorRegistry();
051    }
052
053    private GeneratorRegistry() {
054        if (generatorTracking.isLoggable(Level.FINE)) {
055            generators = new IdentityHashMap<>();
056        }
057    }
058
059    /**
060     * Returns the singleton instance of the registry.
061     *
062     * @return the generator registry
063     */
064    public static GeneratorRegistry instance() {
065        return InstanceHolder.INSTANCE;
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * Adds a generator.
070     *
071     * @param obj the obj
072     */
073    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.GuardLogStatement", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
074    public void add(Object obj) {
075        synchronized (this) {
076            running += 1;
077            if (generators != null) {
078                generators.put(obj, null);
079                generatorTracking.finest(() -> "Added generator " + obj
080                    + ", " + generators.size() + " generators registered: "
081                    + generators.keySet());
082            }
083            if (running == 1) { // NOPMD, no, not using a constant for this.
084                keepAlive = new Thread("GeneratorRegistry") {
085                    @Override
086                    public void run() {
087                        try {
088                            while (true) {
089                                Thread.sleep(Long.MAX_VALUE);
090                            }
091                        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
092                            // Okay, then stop
093                        }
094                    }
095                };
096                keepAlive.start();
097            }
098        }
099    }
100
101    /**
102     * Removes the generator.
103     *
104     * @param obj the generator
105     */
106    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.GuardLogStatement")
107    public void remove(Object obj) {
108        synchronized (this) {
109            running -= 1;
110            if (generators != null) {
111                generators.remove(obj);
112                generatorTracking.finest(() -> "Removed generator " + obj
113                    + ", " + generators.size() + " generators registered: "
114                    + generators.keySet());
115            }
116            if (running == 0) {
117                generatorTracking
118                    .finest(() -> "Zero generators, notifying all.");
119                keepAlive.interrupt();
120                notifyAll();
121            }
122        }
123    }
124
125    /**
126     * Checks if is exhausted (no generators left)
127     *
128     * @return true, if is exhausted
129     */
130    public boolean isExhausted() {
131        return running == 0;
132    }
133
134    /**
135     * Await exhaustion.
136     *
137     * @throws InterruptedException the interrupted exception
138     */
139    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.CollapsibleIfStatements",
140        "PMD.GuardLogStatement" })
141    public void awaitExhaustion() throws InterruptedException {
142        if (generators != null) {
143            synchronized (this) {
144                if (running != generators.size()) {
145                    generatorTracking
146                        .severe(() -> "Generator count doesn't match tracked.");
147                }
148            }
149        }
150        while (running > 0) {
151            // generators.keySet() may call EventProcessor.toString()
152            // which locks on the EventProcessor which may want a lock
153            // on the registry (deadlock). So keep this out of the
154            // synchronized.
155            if (generators != null) {
156                generatorTracking
157                    .fine(() -> "Thread " + Thread.currentThread().getName()
158                        + " is waiting, " + generators.size()
159                        + " generators registered: "
160                        + generators.keySet());
161            }
162            synchronized (this) {
163                if (running > 0) {
164                    wait();
165                }
166            }
167        }
168        generatorTracking
169            .finest("Thread " + Thread.currentThread().getName()
170                + " continues.");
171    }
172
173    /**
174     * Await exhaustion with a timeout.
175     *
176     * @param timeout the timeout
177     * @return true, if successful
178     * @throws InterruptedException the interrupted exception
179     */
180    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.CollapsibleIfStatements",
181        "PMD.GuardLogStatement" })
182    public boolean awaitExhaustion(long timeout)
183            throws InterruptedException {
184        synchronized (this) {
185            if (generators != null) {
186                if (running != generators.size()) {
187                    generatorTracking.severe(
188                        "Generator count doesn't match tracked.");
189                }
190            }
191            if (isExhausted()) {
192                return true;
193            }
194            if (generators != null) {
195                generatorTracking
196                    .fine(() -> "Waiting, generators: " + generators.keySet());
197            }
198            wait(timeout);
199            if (generators != null) {
200                generatorTracking
201                    .fine(() -> "Waited, generators: " + generators.keySet());
202            }
203            return isExhausted();
204        }
205    }
206}
